The Mayixi No.1 Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Panzhou, Guizhou Province, China

operators: Guizhou Panjiang Mayi Coal Industry Company
owners: Guizhou Panjiang Coal and Electricity Group
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Guizhou Panjiang Mayi Coal Industry Company, which is fully owned by Guizhou Panjiang Coal and Electricity Group.
